Title: Requires electric corporations to prioritize restoring services to police departments, fire departments, and ambulance services, when such services are interrupted
Summary: Requires electric corporations to prioritize restoring services to police departments, fire departments, and ambulance services, when such services are interrupted; prohibits such corporations from charging rate payers a higher rate for extra costs incurred due to prioritizing such services.
LawCode: Add ยง73, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring electric corporations to prioritize restoring services to police departments, fire departments, and ambulance services, when electric services are interrupted
